items.title: Super Micro logs record revenue from AI demand, and the stock surges
items.description: Super Micro’s revenue exploded to $12.7 billion as delayed orders finally materialized, but aggressive competition and rising costs pushed gross margi...

items.title: Chase cut my credit-card limit due to lower usage. Will this affect my credit score and lead other banks to do the same?
items.description: “I’m wondering whether this could cause a ripple effect in which other banks might do the same with my lesser-used credit cards.”

items.title: ‘I’m spooked’: Do gold and silver belong in my retirement portfolio after their dramatic fall in value?
items.description: “Before you ask, there is nothing extreme about 5% of my ‘alternative’ assets.”

items.title: ‘This is our second marriage’: We’re in our 60s. How do we split expenses if we move in together and rent one house?
items.description: “We have been taking turns living in his house and my house.”

items.title: Oracle’s monster $25 billion debt financing points to anxieties around AI funding
items.description: Oracle plans to raise up to another $25 billion this year but said the sales would be either equity or equity-linked issuances.
